name: Data Collector Insights
author: Shahidul Islam

sections.description:
Data Collector Insights helps you collect valuable user data within your WordPress site to gain insights into your audience and improve your [benefit of data collection, e.g., marketing efforts, user experience, content creation].

Third-Party Services

Gravatar
We use the Gravatar service to display user profile images. You can find more about it at gravatar.com.

Email Verifier
This service is used to verify email addresses as part of our features. You have the option to enable or disable this feature according to your preference. Learn more at emailverifier.reoon.com.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload data-collector-insights folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Start using it by going to the editor.

short_description: Manage and view collected data in a user-friendly interface.
